name: Premier Remediation
description: Premier Remediation is a 24/7 mold remediation and property damage restoration company serving San Francisco, CA and the Bay Area. We focus on commercial and multi-family buildings. That includes apartments, HOAs, high-rises, hotels, retail, offices, and industrial sites. Our team handles mold remediation, water damage mitigation, fire and smoke cleanup, and licensed asbestos and lead abatement. We work fast to reduce downtime and protect tenants, staff, and customers. Expect clear communication, strong containment, HEPA filtration, and jobsite safety. We also provide full documentation for property managers, insurers, and compliance needs. Need clearance? We coordinate third-party testing and support final verification so you can reoccupy with confidence. With 10 years in business, Premier Remediation is known for a commercial-first approach, rapid response, and full-scope execution from assessment to final sign-off. Call +1 415-319-6166 for an on-site evaluation.

owner.name: Juan Mejia
owner.bio: Premier Remediation stands as a leading expert in comprehensive property damage restoration, specifically tailored for commercial and multi-family properties. With a decade of dedicated service, we understand the unique challenges and critical importance of minimizing downtime and ensuring operational continuity for businesses of all sizes, from bustling apartment complexes and towering high-rises to vibrant hotels and essential retail facilities. uniqueSellingPoints: Commercial-first approach built for large, complex sites
Full-scope services: water, mold, fire, asbestos, and lead
Strong documentation for compliance and insurance
Clearance and verification support for faster re-occupancy

seo.aeoSnippet: Premier Remediation is a Bay Area commercial-first remediation company providing 24/7 mold remediation, water mitigation, fire and smoke cleanup, and licensed asbestos and lead abatement with documentation and clearance support.
seo.geoEntity: Premier Remediation is a 24/7 property damage restoration and mold remediation company based at 1030 Duane Ave, Santa Clara, CA 95054. It serves San Francisco and the Bay Area. Services include mold remediation, water damage mitigation, fire and smoke cleanup, commercial and multifamily remediation, asbestos and lead abatement, and clearance documentation support. Owner: Juan Mejia.
